title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.16.100.51 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2020-8-13 23:11 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft基岩版 1.16.30 仍未发布，1.16.100.51为其第1个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047675171

此版本没有任何内容更新，仅是修复漏洞
修复了45个bug

Stability and Performance性能和稳定性The game no longer crashes if a player opens a Shulker Box they're standing on after rejoining a multiplayer session (MCPE-60856)修复了重新加入多人会话后站在潜影盒上并打开潜影盒时发生的崩溃问题

Vanilla Parity原版统一性Sea Turtles now play a sound when they lay eggs海龟下蛋时会发出声音了Dolphins will now dry out at the same rate as they do in Java Edition; 120 seconds将海豚的窒息时间与Java版统一，为120秒Undamaged Mending items will no longer prevent damaged Mending items from being repaired (MCPE-80156)无损坏的物品不会再影响经验修补的效果了Basalt can no longer be destroyed by Ghast fireballs (MCPE-75252)玄武岩不能被恶魂的火球破坏了Basalt blocks now take slightly more time to destroy玄武岩将要更多的时间进行挖掘TNT no longer activates when a Redstone Torch is placed directly on it (MCPE-81258)在TNT上放红石火把不会触发TNT了Experience Orbs now float in water (MCPE-64039)经验球会浮在水上了Adjusted Netherite movement in lava (MCPE-65372)优化了下界合金锭在熔岩上的效果Trade discounts from Hero of the Village and Curing Zombie Villagers now match the Java Edition (MCPE-70782)将村庄英雄与治愈僵尸村民的折扣效果与Java版统一Pistons can no longer be extended above the build height limit or into the void (MCPE-37825, MCPE-51067)活塞不能伸长至超过高度限制到达虚空了

General常规Grindstone no longer shows a result unless it changes the item (MCPE-54256)修复了砂轮放入未附魔物品的情况下依然显示祛魔结果的问题Water from bubble columns now flows as it should (MCPE-36463)含有气泡的水源（比如灵魂沙上）会正常蔓延，不会只流一格了Custom named boats and minecarts will now save their name after placing and breaking. Their names will also be shown in the world (MCPE-25845)放置或破坏命名过的船只或矿车后会正常保存其名字并显示在游戏中了Smelted items (prior to 1.13) no longer contain incorrect damage values and can be stacked (MCPE-54617)修复了1.13以前的烧制物品的耐久值，现可以正常堆叠了Hostile mobs can now spawn in thunderstorms during the day (MCPE-34409)敌对生物会在白天雷暴下正常生成了Shearing a Snow Golem now drops a carved pumpkin (MCPE-66967)裁剪雪傀儡会正常掉落雕刻过的南瓜了Bees now leave their hive/nest after an allotted time in the End and Nether dimensions (MCPE-58322)在下界和末地的蜜蜂会正常离开蜂箱/蜂巢了Water now flows correctly near edges水会在边界正常流动了Fixed a bug that could cause falling blocks to duplicate near a portal (MCPE-68229)修复了用末地传送门和掉落的方块刷物品的问题Villagers no longer get locked into the wrong profession (MCPE-62080)村民更改职业时不会再出错了Dragon Egg no longer disappears if placed on pedestal and Ender Dragon is respawned (MCPE-78400)放在基座上的龙蛋在末影龙重生时不会消失了Music is no longer interrupted when entering water in ocean biomes (MCPE-76213)进入海洋生物群系的水中时不会中断音乐了Saplings will no longer incorrectly transform into a bee nest when next to a tree and flowers (MCPE-80543)将树苗放在树木或花朵旁边时不会错误地变为蜂巢了Hoppers with containers above them can no longer collect dropped items (MCPE-80555)上方有放置箱子的漏斗不会再收集掉落物了Gravity affected blocks no longer break when their supporting block is moved by a piston (MCPE-81106)收重力影响的方块不会因活塞臂的移动而被破坏了Podzol no longer generates below the top layer when spawning large spruce trees (MCPE-71995)种植大型云杉树时不会再顶层方块下生成灰化土了Fixed an issue that caused rails to not be powered correctly along the x-axis (MCPE-81987)修复了铁轨无法沿着x轴充能的问题Turtles and Dolphins on land will now successfully move towards water (MCPE-44918)陆地上的海龟和海豚会正常蹦到水里了Compass items will now point the correct direction when the player is in a boat (MCPE-56876)船上的玩家使用指南针时会正常指明方向了Mob's inactivity timer is now reset when closer than 32 blocks from the nearest player当最近的玩家离生物不到32格方块时，不活跃计时器会正常重置了Ghasts once again spawn in all light levels (MCPE-85747)恶魂会在所有亮度下正常生成了Fixed Vex movement along the x and z directions (MCPE-41879)修复了恼鬼只沿着x轴和z轴移动的问题Blaze now switch between melee attack and ranged attack based on the distance from the player (MCPE-45469)烈焰人会正常判断距离并选择近战或远程攻击了Falling blocks now break after falling for extended periods of time (MCPE-73124)修复了在灵魂沙气泡柱里塞个沙砾，能让玩家彻底卡里面不能动的问题Name tags now work correctly again (MCPE-65535)修复了命名牌不正常的问题Collecting fish with a bucket now works more consistently统一了用桶收集鱼的动作

User Interface用户界面Fixed a visual issue where clicking to edit the text box in the NPC dialog would not show the caret (Education Edition Features)修复了NPC对话框的文本中不会显示 ^ 字符的问题（教育版）

New Achievements Screen新的成就界面We have made some tweaks to the new achievements screen that is available to some beta players (through a gradual roll-out). Please continue to share your feedback on it in this post!我们对可使用新成就界面的玩家推送了一些更改（正在逐步推送）。如有问题，请在此贴中进行反馈！Gamepad bumpers can now be used to switch tabs in the achievements screen手柄的LB/RB按钮可以用于选择成就界面的标签了Tweaked the default focus on the tabs in the achievements screen更改了选项卡上的默认光标位置Added extra space between the end of the list and the "input legend" at the bottom在内容尾部和底栏的“输入图例”之间加入了额外的间隔The achievement detail screen now shows "Completed on other platform" section详细信息界面会显示“已在其它平台上完成”这一部分了

Technical Updates技术性更新Fix for ItemDescriptors修复了物品自述的问题Item names of the format "minecraft:item.someitem" no longer need the "item." portion and it will be ignored物品名的"minecraft:item.someitem"字段可以去掉 "item."了，此部分也会被忽略Added Entity Movement Prediction加入实体移动预判机制
